tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    duration_minutes INT,
    usage_gallons INT
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    area_id INT,
    water_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    irrigation_start_time TIME,
    irrigation_end_time TIME,
    water_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    frequency VARCHAR(20)
);
